com.sadakatsu.clue.exception

Class InvalidDisprove

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.sadakatsu.clue.exception.ClueException
          • com.sadakatsu.clue.exception.InvalidDisprove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InvalidDisprove
extends ClueException
    The InvalidDisprove represents that a Player (server-side) or AI (client- side) tried to disprove a Suggestion with a Card that is not in the intersection between the Suggestion's Cards and the player's/AI's hand. This is against the rules.
    Author:
    Joseph A. Craig
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        player - The Player who improperly tried to disprove the passed Suggestion.
